00052 typedef struct _BinImage
00053 {
00054         long loadAddress; // load address on flash
00055         long baseAddress; // base address in RAM
00056         long size;                // size in bytes
00057         long dataOffset;  // virtual address of first data, before text
00058         char *pData;      // pointer to start of image data
00059         char *pImageName;  // name of app image
00060 }BinImage;
00061
